summary: The son of a Jewish Cantor must defy the traditions of his religious father in order to pursue his dream of becoming a jazz singer.
cast: Al Jolson|May McAvoy|Warner Oland|Eugenie Besserer|Otto Lederer|Robert Gordon|Richard Tucker|Yossele Rosenblatt|Jane Arden|Ernest Belcher|Violet Bird|Nat Carr|Claire Delmar|William Demarest|Neely Edwards|Audrey Ferris|Joseph Green|Ena Gregory|Leon Holmes|Roscoe Karns|Seymour Kupper|Mary Grace Larsen|Myrna Loy|John Miljan|Margaret Oliver|Ty Parvis|Anders Randolf|Walter Rodgers|Carolynne Snowden|Marie Stapleton|Will Walling|Fred Warren|Stanhope Wheatcroft
title: El cantor de Jazz
